subject: Seasonal Greetings To You My D
body:
Seasonal Greetings To You My Dearest Friend,
IF YOU FAIL TO SEND THE $25 THIS WEEK YOUR $850,000,00 WILL BE GONE.
I know my reason for the continuous sending of this notification to you, the fact is that you can't seem to trust any one again over this payment for what you have been through in the past months or may i say years, but I want you to trust me, I cannot scam you for $25.00 it is for delivery processing of your package.
I have been waiting for you since then to contact me for the delivery of this your Compensation fund Eight Hundred And Fifty Thousand United States Dollars ( $850,000.00 ) Only, but I have not heard from you since that time, i want you to know that i have paid for the Delivering Charges and Clearance Certificate Fee of your Fund showing that it is not a Drug Money or meant to sponsor Terrorism attack in any Country and 
the only money you will send to deliver your package directly to your postal Address in your country is $25.00.
You are advised to send the $25.00 by purchasing an iTunes Card Or  Steam Wallet, i mean any of the Cards you can find just get it for $25.00 With all due respect, please do not delay to send this fee Today because this is a last chance and final conclusion. Kindly do your best now to send the Fee and update me immediately, i understand that you have went through a lot in the past but i tell you my friend you may not get this opportunity again so don't joke with it, send the Card as soon as possible.
As soon as the payment is received today, you will receive your $850,000.00 package without any delay.
Finally, make sure that you re-confirm your Postal address........and Direct Telephone number......... to avoid any mistake in this delivery.
Looking forward to hear back from you soon,
   Best Regard.
Mrs. Ruth Oscar.

subject: Re: Seasonal Greetings To You My D
body:
Dear Mrs. Ruth Oscar,

Thank you for reaching out to me and for your seasonal greetings. I appreciate your concern and willingness to help with the delivery of my package. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please provide more details about the package? What is it exactly and where is it coming from? Also, why do I need to purchase a card or steam wallet in order to receive it? I'm just trying to understand the process better.

Best wishes,
Forrest
